    def test_2_bill_payment_with_empty_fields(self):
        """Test 2: Submit bill payment with empty fields should show validation errors"""
        print("\n" + "="*60)
        print("TEST 2: Bill Payment with Empty Fields")
        print("="*60)
    
        # Step 1: Register new user
        print("\nStep 1: Registering new user...")
        home_page = HomePage(self.driver)
        home_page.navigate_to_register_page()
    
        user_data = TestData.get_valid_user_data()
        print(f"Username: {user_data['username']}")
    
        register_page = RegisterPage(self.driver)
        register_page.register_user(user_data)
        time.sleep(2)
    
        # Step 2: Go to Bill Pay page
        print("\nStep 2: Going to Bill Pay page...")
        self.driver.get("https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/billpay.htm")
        time.sleep(2)
    
        bill_pay_page = BillPayPage(self.driver)
    
        # Step 3: Submit empty form
        print("\nStep 3: Submitting empty form...")
        bill_pay_page.click_send_payment()
        time.sleep(2)
    
        # Step 4: Verify validation errors
        print("\nStep 4: Verifying validation errors...")
    
        # Check if we're still on the form page (should not redirect on error)
        assert "Bill Pay" in self.driver.title or "billpay" in self.driver.current_url, \
            "Should remain on bill pay page when form has errors"
    
        # Check for validation errors
        errors = bill_pay_page.get_validation_errors()
        print(f"Found {len(errors)} validation error(s)")
    
        if errors:
            for error in errors:
                print(f"  - {error}")
    
        # Should have validation errors for required fields
